spec_data.Name: rubygem-rails-deprecated_sanitizer
spec_data.Description:
In Rails 4.2 HTML sanitization has been rewritten using a more secure library.

This gem includes the old behavior shipping with Rails 4.2 and before. It is
strictly provided to ease migration. It will be supported until Rails 5.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Thu 27 Jul 2017 05:19:45 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Deprecated sanitizer API extracted from Action View
